alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Madison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 11:06AM EST until March 10 at 4:13AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River and Eel River. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers and their tributaries. River stages are rising again due to previous rainfall over the weekend. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Anderson. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Extensive flooding of all city parks. The lowest areas of Irondale begin to flood. West 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and N Sycamore Streets flood in northern Anderson. Manhole at Athletic Park behind pool begins to overflow. Killbuck Creek overflows into Aqua Gardens/Shadyside Lake closing off walking paths around lakes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM EST Tuesday was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1115 PM EST /1015 PM CST/.
